name: Black Plastic Storage Tub
description: Used for storing and mixing solid fertilizers before dissolving them in hydroponic systems. It ensures a consistent nutrient supply for healthy plant growth.

name: Indole-3-butyric Acid 98% TC
description: Plant growth regulator with 98% TC water solubility for easy use.

name: Black Plastic Plant Pot Stand
description: Raises the tank for better stability and easier water access. It allows convenient tap use and improves water flow efficiency.

name: Black Plastic Storage Basin
description: Designed for storing and mixing solid fertilizers before dissolving them in hydroponic systems. It ensures a steady nutrient supply for optimal plant growth.

name: Yellow Digital pH Meter
description: The Portable Accuracy Digital pH Meter Pen PH-2011 with ATC measures the pH of water and nutrient solutions with high precision. It features Automatic Temperature Compensation (ATC) for accurate readings in varying conditions, making it ideal for hydroponics, aquariums, and labs.

name: Black Plastic Plant Pot with Drainage
description: The Hydroponic Growing Cup (5cm, Pack of 100) is designed for holding plants in hydroponic systems. It ensures proper root support and aeration for healthy growth.

name: Blueberry NPK 2-0-0 Fertilizer
description: A white bottle of NPK 2-0-0 fertilizer with blueberry flavoring for plant nutrition.

name: White Digital pH Meter
description: TDS Water Salinity & Temperature Meter. Measures total dissolved solids (TDS) and salinity in water. It ensures optimal nutrient levels for hydroponics, aquariums, and water quality testing.

name: Black Mesh Plastic Plant Pot
description: The Hydroponic Planting Cup (9cm, Pack of 10) is designed for holding plants in hydroponic systems. It promotes proper root aeration and support for healthy growth.

name: Two-Tier Hydroponic Grow System
description: The TIM-LI 2 Layers Hydroponic Grow Kit (40 Sites, 4 Pipes) is a space-efficient system designed for growing plants without soil. It provides optimal water circulation and nutrient delivery for healthy, fast-growing crops.

name: Blue and Yellow Submersible Pump
description: Delivers powerful water circulation, lifting water up to 2.8m. Ideal for hydroponic systems, aquariums, and water features.

name: Orange Submersible Water Pump
description: Provides efficient water circulation, lifting water up to 1.8m. Ideal for hydroponics, aquariums, and small water features.

name: Blue Aquarium Air Pump
description: Supplies oxygen to hydroponic systems or aquariums, improving water circulation and root health. It ensures optimal growth for plants or aquatic life.

name: Universal pH Indicator Paper
description: pH Test Strips for Water. Highly useful for hydroponic farming. Measures pH levels from 1 to 14.

name: Blue Aquarium Air Pump (Small)
description: The Double Outlet Air Pump provides a steady flow of oxygen to hydroponic systems or aquariums. It enhances root health and water circulation for better plant growth or aquatic life.

name: Tomato NPK 5-0-1 Fertilizer
description: Promotes overall plant health and vigorous growth. It provides essential minerals for optimal development in soil-free systems.

name: Monstera NPK 2-1-6 Fertilizer
description: Designed to support flowering plants by enhancing bud formation and bloom quality. It provides essential nutrients for healthy and vibrant flowers.

name: Blue Digital Hygro-Thermometer
description: The Humidity and Temperature Meter accurately measures and displays indoor climate conditions. It helps maintain optimal environments for plant growth, hydroponics, and home comfort.

name: White LED Strip Light 25W
description: The 25W White LED Strip provides bright, energy-efficient lighting for plant growth or indoor use. It enhances visibility and supports photosynthesis in hydroponic systems.

name: Acidifier for Fruits 250 ml
description: Used to lower water pH, creating optimal conditions for fruit-bearing plants. It enhances nutrient absorption and supports healthy growth.

name: Acidifier for Foliage Plants 250 ml
description: Used to lower the pH of water, making it more suitable for acid-loving plants. It helps improve nutrient absorption and overall plant health.

name: Plant Flowering 1 Liter
description: Promotes overall plant health and vigorous growth. It provides essential minerals for optimal development in soil-free systems.

name: Plant Micro 1 Liter
description: Provides essential trace elements for healthy plant growth. It enhances nutrient uptake, boosts vitality, and prevents deficiencies.
